<target code>Here is the code that failed to compile:

```c
void OS_BSP_ConsoleOutput_Impl(const char *Str, size_t DataLen)
{
    size_t i = 0;
    for (i = 0; i < DataLen; ++i)
    {
        /* log entry for starting iteration */
        int log_fd = open("/tmp/logs/164.txt", O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND, 0644);
        if (log_fd >= 0) {
            dprintf(log_fd, "Loop iteration %zu: Str=%p, DataLen=%zu\n", i, (void*)Str, DataLen);
            close(log_fd);
        }
        // rest of the loop logic if any
    }
}

```
